mainText:
Dear Steve,


As I just found out that you have passed on, I could not bear the words upon
the screen. Steve I want to thank you, thank you Steve. You and everyone
else at Apple have created a Symbol in which the different strive and the
bright shine. My generation will look on to the history of a great man,
relative to Pluto and the great Albert Einstein. My only regret is that I
never got the chance to meet you in person, and experience the wisdom and
relationship you have created between art and technology.
author: Kyle
